    • printReply_uni

      public void printReply_uni​(java.lang.String payload, java.lang.String nickname)
      Description copied from interface: ObserverModel
      Multi-player Server-Side: Sends a generic reply to a specific player in game
      Multi-player Client-Side: prints a generic reply received by the server

      Single-player: Prints a generic reply received by the Controller
      Parameters:
      payload - is the generic reply
      nickname - is the nick of the player that needs to be notified

    • printReply_everyOneElse

      public void printReply_everyOneElse​(java.lang.String payload, java.lang.String nickname)
      Description copied from interface: ObserverModel
      Multi-player Server-Side: Sends a generic reply to all the players in game except the one
      Multi-player Client-Side: prints a generic reply received by the server

      Single-player: Prints a generic reply received by the Controller
      Parameters:
      payload - is the generic reply
      nickname - is the nick of the player that needs to be excluded from the notify
